channel.title: About on Bidwell Chen
channel.description: Recent content in About on Bidwell Chen

item.title: 自我介绍
item.description: Bidwell Chen 福州大学 软件工程硕士 ⼯作也有⼆⼗多年了，刚毕业曾担任⼀年职业中专的计算机⽼师。后来在不同的软件公司做过开发和管理。有特⼒惠科技的国⼟政务平台、百洲信息科技的⽔利政务平台、新意科技的证券业务平台。 从业时间最⻓的是在⼀家外贸公司（百美公司）负责内部IT，有⼗年多。现在这公司被纳斯达克上市的⼤健云仓收购合并。开发企业内部定单管理，电⼦商务，仓储管理等系统。 平时喜欢了解新技术，新框架，后端开发及服务器的⾃动部署较多了解。除了⾯对技术，也⾯试了不少⼈。

item.title: Self Introduction
item.description: I am Master of Software Engineering from Fuzhou University. After graduation, I served as a computer teacher in a vocational secondary school for one year. Later, I worked in different software companies in development and management roles. I have worked on the National Land Governance Platform in 特力惠 Technology, the Water Conservancy Governance Platform in 百洲 Information Technology, and the Securities Business Platform in 新意 Technology. The longest time I worked was in a foreign trade company Permaisuri where I was responsible for IT for over ten years.
